# NSImage.CacheMode

**Enumeration**

Constants that specify the caching policy on a per-image basis.

## Declaration

```swift
enum CacheMode
```

## Overview

Set the caching policy using the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSImage/cacheMode-swift.property] property.

The following table specifies the default caching policy for the various types of image representation.



## Cache Options

- **NSImage.CacheMode.default**: Caching is unspecified.
- **NSImage.CacheMode.always**: Always generate a cache when drawing.
- **NSImage.CacheMode.bySize**: Cache if the cache size is smaller than the original data.
- **NSImage.CacheMode.never**: Never cache; always draw direct.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Managing Caching Options

- **cacheMode**: The image’s caching mode.
- **recache()**: Invalidates and frees offscreen caches of all image representations.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
